source.name: NOAA's National Geophysical Data Center Geoportal
source.description: The National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC) Geoportal Server provides a suite of new data discovery and access services to one of the nation's primary sources of geophysical data. Covering the spectrum from sea floor bathymetry to solar data, the NGDC archives can now be easily searched by time, space and theme keywords. Geoportal is not only integrated into NGDC's metadata management workflow, but it also provides a federated capability for users to search across all three NOAA data centers using the same technology. While offering a more enhanced interface for human-to-machine discovery and access, Geoportal supports a robust set of standard machine-to-machine web services.
